review_data.title: Piccolo Gioiello su LangStrasse
review_data.content: The Vineria Centrale is good at apero time, dinner and after dinner. The wine selection is amazing, the prosecco selection is amazing and the food is prepared with Love!!!! Even if you just have an aperitif plate, you will be surprised by the mixture and...More

review_data.title: Easy Going and Relaxing
review_data.content: Nice atmosphere, friendly service.. They have a nice selection of wines and Tapas. Very small location but nice in the summer!!

review_data.title: Tiny but Nice Food
review_data.content: We went to Vinery for an early dinner. The restaurant has limited seating but they found us a place to dine. This is an Italian restaurant with a chef from Sicily so the taste of the food was as good as we had in Sicily....More

review_data.title: amazing experience
review_data.content: Yesterday we ate such amazing handmade "cavatelli". The place is very nice, small size but plenty of people! well managed by the chef who also spent her time to entertain us! We will back...surely! STRONGLY RECCOMENDED :)

review_data.title: One-man excellence!
review_data.content: There was one man who did everything in this tiny little bar/restaurant. He was the chef, the bartender, the waiter, and everything. There was no other staff. He did a great job. The gnocchi in sage butter was perfect, as was the orecchiette fresca. Dishes...More

review_data.title: Hidden gem!
review_data.content: This cafe/bar really is a hidden gem in Zurich City West! With a good selection of beers and wine, authentic Italian food lovingly and freshly prepared, and hip yet understated decor, Vineria Centrale manages the rare feat of being trendy without being conceited. Would highly...More
